preVisit.title: I want to make a phone reservation
preVisit.description: AI books appointments after you complete the questionnaire

inVisit.title: I need medical interpretation
inVisit.description: AI provides interpretation after you complete the questionnaire

postVisit.title: I need prescription explanation
postVisit.description: AI explains prescriptions when you photo them

noneHistory.title: No records yet
noneHistory.description: Your records will appear once you use the service.

prescription.title: Medi Mate will analyze and explain {{name}}'s prescription for you!

titleParts.part1: Medi Mate will analyze and explain

steps.step1: Please prepare the prescription you received from the hospital.
steps.step2: Move to an environment with good lighting.
steps.step3:
To ensure all parts of the prescription are clearly visible,
lay it flat and take the photo.
steps.step4: Please add the captured image or file.
steps.step5:
When Medi Mate scans your prescription,
we will explain the medications based on the analysis.
steps.details: (Prescription name, efficacy, usage, precautions, interactions, side effects, storage methods, etc.)

upload.description: Please add your prescription image here.
upload.file_type_error: Only JPEG and PNG files are supported.
upload.no_file_selected: Please upload a prescription image first.

cold.title: Cold Symptoms
cold.description: Prescription for relieving cold symptoms such as headache, fever, and cough with phlegm.

gastrointestinal.title: Digestive Disorders
gastrointestinal.description: Prescription for treating gastrointestinal conditions like gastritis, indigestion, and heartburn.

ophthalmologic.title: Dry Eye Syndrome
ophthalmologic.description: Prescription for relieving dry eye syndrome and eye discomfort.

musculoskeletal.title: Musculoskeletal Pain
musculoskeletal.description: Prescription for relieving musculoskeletal pain including joint and muscle pain.

nutritional.title: Nutritional Supplement
nutritional.description: Vitamin prescription for fatigue recovery and nutritional supplementation.

crop.title: Crop Image
crop.description: Please adjust the area so the prescription is clearly visible.
